analyzed: rtsa dang chu bar zhen cing chags pa'i mtshon lus pa'i zug rngu ni /

original: dang por thur mas bskyod cing bskul la /
analyzed: dang por thur mas bskyod cing bskul la /

original: de'i 'og tu dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dbyung bar bya'o //

original: snying gar gnas pa'i zug rngu ni //
analyzed: snying gar gnas pa'i zug rngu ni //

original: chu grang gtor bas sdangs byas la //
analyzed: chu grang gtor bas sdangs byas la //
translated: should be startled by sprinkling cold water

original: gnas gzhan phyin cing 'phags gyur na //
analyzed: gnas gzhan phyin cing 'phags gyur na //
translated: and, when it has moved to another location,

original: ci rigs par ni dbyung bar bya //
analyzed: ci rigs par ni dbyung bar bya //
translated: it should be removed as appropriate.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: As for that,

original: snying ga'i phyogs su gnas pa'i mtshon gyi zug rdu ni dang por chu grang mo gtor zhing btab pas sdangs shing skrag par byas la /
analyzed: snying ga'i phyogs su gnas pa'i mtshon gyi zug rdu ni dang por chu grang mo gtor zhing btab pas sdangs shing skrag par byas la /
translated: The arrow of the weapon that is located in the region of the heart is first frightened by the sprinkling of cold water.

original: sdangs pas de gnas gzhan du 'chugs shing /
analyzed: sdangs pas de gnas gzhan du 'chugs shing /

original: 'phags par gyur na ci rigs par dbyung bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'phags par gyur na ci rigs par dbyung bar bya ste /

analyzed: cha spyad gang 'tsham pas dbyung ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it should be removed by whatever instrument is suitable.

original: rma yi sgo nas dbyung dka' ba //
analyzed: rma yi sgo nas dbyung dka' ba //
translated: It is difficult to remove it through the door of the wound.

original: gzhan dag la yang de bzhin @282b bya ;🔽/ zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzhan dag la yang de bzhin @282b bya ; / zhes bya ba la /

original: mtshon dang po gang du zug pa'i rma'i sgo nas dbyung zhing gdon bar dka' ba gzhan dag la yang zug rngu de gnas gzhan du bskyod la dral te /🔽dbyung bar bya'o //🔽rus par zug la rkang pa ni //
analyzed: mtshon dang po gang du zug pa'i rma'i sgo nas dbyung zhing gdon bar dka' ba gzhan dag la yang zug rngu de gnas gzhan du bskyod la dral te / dbyung bar bya'o // rus par zug la rkang pa ni //
translated: In the case of a wound in which it is difficult to remove the arrow through the door of the wound where it first entered, the arrow should be moved to another location, and then removed.

original: gnyis kyis mnan la drang bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gnyis kyis mnan la drang bar bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: In the case of a wound in which the arrow has penetrated the bone, the person with the arrow wound should be held down by two people and straightened out.

original: zug rdu gang zhig rus par zug par gyur pa'i mi zug rngu can de rkang pa gnyis kyis mnan la /
analyzed: zug rdu gang zhig rus par zug par gyur pa'i mi zug rngu can de rkang pa gnyis kyis mnan la /
translated: In the case of a person with an arrow wound in which the arrow has penetrated the bone, two people should hold down the person with the arrow wound.

original: zug rngu de cha spyad kyis drang zhing gdon bar bya'o //
analyzed: zug rngu de cha spyad kyis drang zhing gdon bar bya'o //
translated: The arrow should be extracted with the instrument.

original: de ltar ma nus stobs che ba'i //
analyzed: de ltar ma nus stobs che ba'i //
translated: If that is not possible,

original: g-yog gis dam du bzung ste dbyung //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: g-yog gis dam du bzung ste dbyung // zhes bya ba la /

original: de ltar rnam pa des zug rngu dbyung ba ma nus na shin tu stobs che zhing nus pa dang ldan pa'i g-yog bsgo ba bzhin du byed pas cha spyad kyis shin tu dam du bzung ste dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa des zug rngu dbyung ba ma nus na shin tu stobs che zhing nus pa dang ldan pa'i g-yog bsgo ba bzhin du byed pas cha spyad kyis shin tu dam du bzung ste dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: In this way, if the arrow cannot be extracted with that method, then it should be extracted with the instrument, held very firmly by a powerful assistant who does as he is told.

original: 'on kyang ma nus mde'u'i rtsa //🔽bkug la gzhu rgyud dam btags la //
analyzed: 'on kyang ma nus mde'u'i rtsa // bkug la gzhu rgyud dam btags la //
translated: If that is not possible, then the tip of the arrow🔽should be bent and tied with a bowstring.

original: rta srab kyi ni kha lcags mthar //
analyzed: rta srab kyi ni kha lcags mthar //
translated: Then, with a halter of horsewhip cord,

original: ma yengs pa yis dam btags te //
analyzed: ma yengs pa yis dam btags te //
translated: it should be firmly tied at the end.

original: yan lag lnga po legs bsdams nas //🔽rta ni lcag gis gzhus nas su //
analyzed: yan lag lnga po legs bsdams nas // rta ni lcag gis gzhus nas su //
translated: Having restrained the five limbs well,🔽the horse should be whipped with a whip.

original: brdeg cing mgo bo bteg nas ni //🔽shugs kyis ci bzhin bstod nas ni //
analyzed: brdeg cing mgo bo bteg nas ni // shugs kyis ci bzhin bstod nas ni //
translated: While striking, raising its head,🔽and neighing with all its might,

original: de ltar zug rngu dbyung ba'am //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de ltar zug rngu dbyung ba'am // zhes bya ba la /
translated: the arrow should be extracted in this way.

original: de lta na yang zug rngu dbyung bar ma nus na /
analyzed: de lta na yang zug rngu dbyung bar ma nus na /

original: mde'u'i rtsa ba dam du bkug la /
analyzed: mde'u'i rtsa ba dam du bkug la /
translated: Tightly grasp the base of the arrow.

original: gzhu rgyud kyi phyogs gcig la dam du btags shing bcings te /
analyzed: gzhu rgyud kyi phyogs gcig la dam du btags shing bcings te /
translated: Tie and bind it tightly to one side of the bowstring.

original: gzhu rgyud kyi phyogs gcig rta srab kyi kha lcags kyi yang mig la sman pas gzhan du ma yengs par dam du btags te /
analyzed: gzhu rgyud kyi phyogs gcig rta srab kyi kha lcags kyi yang mig la sman pas gzhan du ma yengs par dam du btags te /
translated: Tie it tightly to the eye of the bit of the bridle on one side of the bowstring.

original: rta'i yan lag lnga po legs par bsdams shing dul bar byas shing de'i 'og tu rta lcag gis gzhus na /
analyzed: rta'i yan lag lnga po legs par bsdams shing dul bar byas shing de'i 'og tu rta lcag gis gzhus na /
translated: After the five limbs of the horse are well bound and tamed, then strike it with the whip.

original: ci nas kyang mgo drag tu bteg pa'i shugs kyis zug rngu 'byin par nus pa de ltar bya'o //🔽yang na shing gi yal gar gdags //
analyzed: ci nas kyang mgo drag tu bteg pa'i shugs kyis zug rngu 'byin par nus pa de ltar bya'o // yang na shing gi yal gar gdags //
translated: In that way, it will be able to lift its head with force and expel the pain.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Or, hang it from a branch of a tree.

original: yang na rnam pa gong ma ltar gzhu rgyud kyi rtse mo gcig mde'u la brtod de /
analyzed: yang na rnam pa gong ma ltar gzhu rgyud kyi rtse mo gcig mde'u la brtod de /
translated: In the other way, as above, tie one end of the bowstring to the arrow.

original: rtse mo gcig shing gi yal ga btud pa la brtod de /
analyzed: rtse mo gcig shing gi yal ga btud pa la brtod de /
translated: Hang the other end from a branch of a tree.

original: btang bas zug rngu dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: btang bas zug rngu dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: By letting go, the pain will be expelled.

original: mde'u rtsa phra bar srad bu dag / btags te zug rngu dbyung bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mde'u rtsa phra bar srad bu dag / btags te zug rngu dbyung bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
translated: Tie a thin string to the base of the arrow and pull out the pain.

original: zug rngu gang gis mde'u rtsa ba phra zhing chad par @283a * //
analyzed: zug rngu gang gis mde'u rtsa ba phra zhing chad par @283a * //
translated: The arrowhead is the most subtle part of the arrow and is the part that penetrates.🔽

original: gyur du dogs pa yin na srang bu phra mo btags te dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: gyur du dogs pa yin na srang bu phra mo btags te dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: If the pain is from a splinter, and you fear that the tip is thin and will break off, tie a fine thread around it and pull it out.

original: rma skrangs mde'u rtsa mi snang na //
analyzed: rma skrangs mde'u rtsa mi snang na //
translated: If the wound is swollen and the tip of the splinter is not visible,

original: skrangs pa legs par btsir nas dbyung //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: skrangs pa legs par btsir nas dbyung // zhes bya ba la /
translated: squeezing the swelling well, remove it.

original: rma yi kha skrangs pas zug rngu'i mde'u rtsa ba mi snang bar gyur na /
analyzed: rma yi kha skrangs pas zug rngu'i mde'u rtsa ba mi snang bar gyur na /
translated: If the opening of the wound is swollen, and the tip of the splinter is not visible,

original: skrangs pa de legs par btsir zhing mnan nas dbyung bar bya'o //🔽dong bu tho bas brdungs pa yis //
analyzed: skrangs pa de legs par btsir zhing mnan nas dbyung bar bya'o // dong bu tho bas brdungs pa yis //
translated: squeezing and pressing the swelling well, remove it.

original: mtho zhing snang bar gyur na dbyung //
analyzed: mtho zhing snang bar gyur na dbyung //
translated: If the splinter is high and visible, remove it

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: with a surgical instrument called a “splinter extractor,” which is struck with a hammer.

original: zug rngu mtho zhing 'phags par snang bar gyur na cha spyad dong bu zhes bya ba tho bas brdung pas dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: zug rngu mtho zhing 'phags par snang bar gyur na cha spyad dong bu zhes bya ba tho bas brdung pas dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: If the splinter is high and visible, use a surgical instrument called a “splinter extractor,” which is struck with a hammer, to remove it.

original: lam ma yin par byung ba gang //
analyzed: lam ma yin par byung ba gang //
translated: If it has come out in the wrong way,

original: de nyid kyis ni rmar dbyung bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni rmar dbyung bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: remove it with the same [instrument].

original: tho ba de nyid kyis zug rngu bskyod la /
analyzed: tho ba de nyid kyis zug rngu bskyod la /
translated: With that same hammer, shake the splinter, and

original: lam ma yin pa las rang gi rgyu ba'i lam rma'i sgo dang nye bar drangs la /
analyzed: lam ma yin pa las rang gi rgyu ba'i lam rma'i sgo dang nye bar drangs la /
translated: Draw the path of its movement near the opening of the wound.🔽

analyzed: de'i 'og tu lam ji lta ba las dbyung bar bya'o // mde'u zur bcum ste dbyung ba 'am //
translated: The path of the arrow should be drawn near to the opening of the wound, and then the arrow should be removed in the same way that it had entered.🔽The arrow should be removed by bending the joint,

analyzed: dong bu'i kha yis dbyung bar bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: or by removing it with the mouth of a horn.

analyzed: mde'u zug rngu'i zur can nam rna ba can yod na rna ba de bcum zhing bsdus la / lhod par byas te /
translated: If the arrow has a bent or crooked joint, the joint should be bent and drawn in.

original: dbyung ba'am dong bu'i khas legs par dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbyung ba'am dong bu'i khas legs par dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: It should be loosened and removed, or removed with the mouth of a horn.

original: rna ba med cing rma kha dbye //🔽drang 'dug khab long bstan pas dbyung //
analyzed: rna ba med cing rma kha dbye // drang 'dug khab long bstan pas dbyung //
translated: If the arrow has no joint and the wound is open,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: it should be removed by sitting straight and showing the magnet.

original: zug rngu'i mde'u rna ba med pa dang / rma kha bye zhing phye ba dang / drang por 'dug cing thad kar gnas pa dag ni /
analyzed: zug rngu'i mde'u rna ba med pa dang / rma kha bye zhing phye ba dang / drang por 'dug cing thad kar gnas pa dag ni /
translated: If the arrow has no joint and the wound is open and straight,

analyzed: khab long zhes bya ba'i nor bu'i khyad par bsten pas dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: it should be removed by showing a special jewel called a magnet.

original: zhu ba'i gnas song zug rngu ni /
analyzed: zhu ba'i gnas song zug rngu ni /
translated: If the arrow has gone to a place of suppuration,

original: bkru sman nyid kyis dbyung bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bkru sman nyid kyis dbyung bar bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The physician should remove the splinter with a medicinal enema.

analyzed: zhu ba'i gnas long kha chang kyi nang du zhugs pa'i zug rngu phra mo ni bkru sman btang ba nyid kyis dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: The splinter that has entered the stomach, the seat of digestion, should be removed with a medicinal enema.🔽The physician should remove the splinter that has entered the wind, the poison, the milk, the blood, or the water, by pressing.

original: rlung gnod dug dang nu zho dang // khrag dang chus gnod gzhibs pas bsal //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rlung gnod dug dang nu zho dang // khrag dang chus gnod gzhibs pas bsal // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The splinter that has entered the wind, the poison, the milk, the blood, or the water, should be removed by pressing.

original: rlung gnod pa bskyed pa la sogs pa dag ni zug rngu dang 'dra bar lus la gnod par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: rlung gnod pa bskyed pa la sogs pa dag ni zug rngu dang 'dra bar lus la gnod par byed pa yin la /
translated: The splinter that has entered the wind, etc., causes pain in the body like a splinter.

original: de ni gzhibs pas bsal zhing gdon par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni gzhibs pas bsal zhing gdon par bya'o //
translated: It should be removed by pressing.

original: gre ba'i nang zhugs zug rngu la //
analyzed: gre ba'i nang zhugs zug rngu la //
translated: The splinter that has entered the throat

original: skud pa gre bar gzhug bya ste //🔽padma'i rtsa bar skud pa gdags //
analyzed: skud pa gre bar gzhug bya ste // padma'i rtsa bar skud pa gdags //
translated: should be removed with a thread.🔽The thread should be tied to the root of a lotus.

original: pad rtsa zug rngu lhan cig drang //🔽zhes bya ba la /🔽gre ba'i sbubs kyi nang du zug cing der zhugs @283b pa'i zug rngu ni /

translated: The root of the lotus will pull out the splinter.🔽The splinter that has entered the throat should be removed with a thread.🔽The thread should be tied to the root of a lotus.

original: srin bal la sogs pa'i skud pa gzhug par bya la /
analyzed: srin bal la sogs pa'i skud pa gzhug par bya la /
translated: The root of the lotus will pull out the splinter.

original: de yang padma'i rtsa ba la skud ba btags te btang la de'i 'og tu padma'i rtsa ba dang zug rngu lhan cig drang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de yang padma'i rtsa ba la skud ba btags te btang la de'i 'og tu padma'i rtsa ba dang zug rngu lhan cig drang bar bya'o //
translated: Moreover, a thread is tied to the root of the lotus and is pulled out from below, together with the lotus root and the splinter.🔽Having made a firm iron probe

original: lcags bsregs mig chur bcug pa yi //
analyzed: lcags bsregs mig chur bcug pa yi //
translated: with an eye for molten iron,

original: lcags thur brtan por byas nas ni //
analyzed: lcags thur brtan por byas nas ni //
translated: one should remove the splinter with lacquer

original: rgya skyegs can nam rgya skyegs med //🔽rgya skyegs kyis bsgos zug rngu dbyung //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rgya skyegs can nam rgya skyegs med // rgya skyegs kyis bsgos zug rngu dbyung // zhes bya ba la /
translated: by smearing it with lac or without lac.

analyzed: zug rngu rgya skyegs can dag gre ba'i sbubs las gdon pa'i thabs ni /
translated: The method of removing a lacquered splinter from the throat is as follows:

original: cha spyad sbubs can gre bar bcug la /
analyzed: cha spyad sbubs can gre bar bcug la /
translated: Having inserted a hollow instrument into the throat,

original: gre ba'i tshigs pa bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gre ba'i tshigs pa bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to protect the joints of the throat,

original: chu bsil mo lcags bsregs pa'i thur ma la blugs pas de gdon par bya'o //
analyzed: chu bsil mo lcags bsregs pa'i thur ma la blugs pas de gdon par bya'o //
translated: one should remove it by pouring cold water on the iron probe heated by fire.

original: rgya skyegs med pa'i zug rngu yang lcags bsregs pa'i thur ma'i rtse rgya skyegs kyis bsgos pa'i smyig ma'am /
analyzed: rgya skyegs med pa'i zug rngu yang lcags bsregs pa'i thur ma'i rtse rgya skyegs kyis bsgos pa'i smyig ma'am /
translated: Also, a splinter without lacquer is removed by inserting a bamboo or reed tip smeared with lac on the tip of an iron probe heated by fire,

original: dong bur bcug ste chus btab pas dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: dong bur bcug ste chus btab pas dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: and pouring water on it.

original: skra shad 'dzings pa 'thungs pa dang // gsher bas tsher ma zug pa gdon //🔽'phral du srad bu thogs pa yis //
analyzed: skra shad 'dzings pa 'thungs pa dang // gsher bas tsher ma zug pa gdon // 'phral du srad bu thogs pa yis //
translated: The hair-tuft should be removed by sucking it out with a wet blade of grass.

original: slon par bya'o des cig shos //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: slon par bya'o des cig shos // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Immediately, the thread should be removed by pulling it out.🔽The hair-tuft is a mass of collected hair. It should be removed by sucking it out with a wet blade of grass.

original: skra'i tshogs bsdus pa'i gong bu ni skra shad 'dzings pa zhes bya la de 'thungs pa dang / gsher ba'i rtsvas chu la sogs pa'i tsher ma ste /🔽nya rus sam /
analyzed: skra'i tshogs bsdus pa'i gong bu ni skra shad 'dzings pa zhes bya la de 'thungs pa dang / gsher ba'i rtsvas chu la sogs pa'i tsher ma ste / nya rus sam /
translated: The thorn of water, etc.🔽is a fish-bone or any other such bone-thorn.

original: gzhan yang de lta bu'i rus pa'i zug rngu dbyung zhing gdon par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang de lta bu'i rus pa'i zug rngu dbyung zhing gdon par bya'o //
translated: It should be removed and extracted.

original: de yang 'phral du ste /
analyzed: de yang 'phral du ste /
translated: And that is immediately,

original: de'i mod srad bu la zug rngu thogs par gyur pas de slon par bya zhing /
analyzed: de'i mod srad bu la zug rngu thogs par gyur pas de slon par bya zhing /
translated: at that very moment. The thorn is stuck in the thread. It should be removed by pulling it out.

original: srad bu'i phyogs gcig tu zug rngu 'byar ba de drang bar bya'o //
analyzed: srad bu'i phyogs gcig tu zug rngu 'byar ba de drang bar bya'o //
translated: The thorn stuck in one side of the thread should be pulled out.

original: yang tsher ma des ni cig shos te /🔽skra shad de drang bar bya ste /
analyzed: yang tsher ma des ni cig shos te / skra shad de drang bar bya ste /
translated: And that is the other one,🔽the hair-tuft. It should be pulled out.

original: srad bu btags shing gsher bag 'thungs pas slon par bya'o //
analyzed: srad bu btags shing gsher bag 'thungs pas slon par bya'o //
translated: The thread should be removed by sucking it out with a wet blade of grass.

original: kha snar drang bar ma nus na /
analyzed: kha snar drang bar ma nus na /
translated: If the mouth and nose cannot be straightened,

original: gzhan du thur du mid par bya //
analyzed: gzhan du thur du mid par bya //
translated: Otherwise, it is swallowed downward.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Otherwise, it should be drawn out by being swallowed.

original: gal te kha snar gyen du zug rngu drang bar ma nus na /
analyzed: gal te kha snar gyen du zug rngu drang bar ma nus na /
translated: If it is not possible to draw out the splinter in the mouth or nose by pulling it upwards,

original: gzhan du na thur du mid cing nang du drang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na thur du mid cing nang du drang bar bya'o //
translated: it should be drawn out by swallowing it and drawing it inwards.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: zas kyis brnangs pa'i zug rngu ni //
analyzed: zas kyis brnangs pa'i zug rngu ni //
translated: The splinter of food

original: chu btung phrag par brdegs pas gzhug / ces bya ba la /
analyzed: chu btung phrag par brdegs pas gzhug / ces bya ba la /
translated: is drawn out by drinking water and beating the shoulders.

original: zas kyis brnangs shing lkog mar chags pa'i kha zas nyid ni zug rngu 'byed bsad pas zug rngu zhes bya la /
analyzed: zas kyis brnangs shing lkog mar chags pa'i kha zas nyid ni zug rngu 'byed bsad pas zug rngu zhes bya la /
translated: The splinter of food is the food itself that is stuck in the throat and chokes.
